Package org.jungrapht.visualization.layout.algorithms

Class CircleLayoutAlgorithm<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jungrapht.visualization.layout.algorithms.CircleLayoutAlgorithm<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, Future, LayoutAlgorithm<V>, AfterRunnable
    public class CircleLayoutAlgorithm<V>
extends Object
implements LayoutAlgorithm<V>, AfterRunnable, Future
    A Layout implementation that positions vertices equally spaced on a regular circle.
    Author:
    Masanori Harada, Tom Nelson - adapted to an algorithm
